CustomField.description: Customer satisfaction field to create average value in reporting
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'5'),5, IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'4'),4, IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'3'),3, IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'2'),2, IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'1'),1, IF(ISPICKVAL (Customer_Satisfaction__c,'0'),null,null))))))
CustomField.label: Customer satisfaction number
